sentence.Network_en: That hawkishness is part of the reason for the euro's rise.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种制止通胀的态度是欧元上升的一部分原因.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2008年5月20日 -  鹰派作风hawkishness 赞美某事物pay tribute to something 赞扬saluted 赞扬某人give somebody credit for something 中日关系专家a Sino-Japanese.

list.abs: given the quickly recovering economy , the RBI has adopted a more hawkish stance and has signalled that policy rate hikes are imminent .由于经济快速复苏，印度储备银行采用了较为强硬的立场，并且表示会在近期采取加息政策。
this hawkish talk did not impress his audience , who reacted with silence .听众对他这一强硬的言论反应不大，以沉默表示回应。
hawk 鹰派/主战派hawkish civilians 主战平民head-to-head battle 肉搏战

behind the scenes , hawkish generals and politicians from Colombia to Israel seem to be using Sri Lanka's experience to justify harsher anti-terror operations .从哥伦比亚来到以色列的鹰派将军和政客似乎在秘密地应用斯里兰卡的经验来证明更大力度打击恐怖势力是正义的。

means.word_mean: 1. any political orientation favoring aggressive policies
